page.title: 08Mr. Fred Winter - A Trainer
page.content: Mr.Winter trains horses in Lambourn.He is a good trainer,has many winners,is very rich and has good horses and stables.In the season he has 55 horses.He has not got a favourite horse.He has been living in Lambourn for 21 years. He thinks Lambourn has changed.There weren't many stables when he came.Barry Hills' stable was half the size to what it is now.He has three jockeys,Ben de Haan,Jimmy Duggan and Neil Fearn.Ray Warren drives the horse box.He has got 26 stable lads.He gets 70 to 75 winners annually.He has won a gold cup and two Grand Nationals.He plays golf twice a week when he isn't at the races.He prefers jumping to the Flat.For his holidays he has been to the Mediterreanean,the Caribbean and America.His hobbies are golf and gardening.He has tried water-skiing,but broke his leg.
